name: CoronaRoad
description:
Corona Road is a simple game. You just have to cross the road many time as possible without getting hit by a coronavirus. Enjoy and stay at home !

To play, use your directional pad.

I did it with PyGame (Python). That's my first *finished* game, and I know it's not something extraordinary, but I learn and I will improve myself.

Any comments are good to take, but stay cool !
